reviewText: I was stressing out about my US Citizenship and Naturalization Interview. The date of the interview was coming up yet I have not done much to prepare for it. So I bought this product sort of last minute and it was great. It was so simple, clear, and fun! Worth every penny. Thank you!
This dvd made learning for the citizenship test easy and fun. It has all the information you need to know for the test. I would definitely recommend it!

This is a fun way to learn the basics of citizenship, because most people think learning US history in classrooms is boring and tiring. This video has the essence of US history to be able to get your citizenship.Citizenship Basics
This helped a family member pass the Citizenship test. The USCIS interviewer was very professional and polite, I was told. Don't be nervous but put in the study - you'll be fine.
Works good. Video is a must. Wife passes first time after watching the video about 200 times. I learned several things about our government as well while watching.
I love it, it's very helpfull!

I recently purchased this set for my parents and they love it. The textbook is very friendly and easy to use. It's full of history lessons, citizenship questions and even grammar! I am so glad I bought this set; it's worth more than the price I paid for it. I highly recommend this product to anyone who is preparing for the citizenship test.
I needed a product like this, so look on the internet and I could find with you,  is good thanks

The video seems to a be copy of an original that was not done properly. The resolution was bad and some of the scripts of the video were  cut off from the page making it impossible to read the entire sentence. I was really disappointed with the production.

My friend is getting ready for her naturalization interview and needed to study.  Citizenship Basics DVD has all of the new 2013 information so it is perfect.  The graphics and pictures really help to memorize all 100 questions.  It is really well made. I definitely recommend it.  It also comes with the MP3 cds so you can listen to the questions and I put them on my ipod so I could listen to them.

Last year, I became an American citizen, and this book and dvd were super helpful in preparing me for the test. It helped me to test my knowledge of history and politics. It was easy to read and prepared me really well for the test. I used this book and the dvd and I am so happy that I passed my citizenship test.
